summary: Water quality is stable but pH is slightly below optimal range for tilapia.

insights.recommendation: Consider adding a pH buffer to stabilize levels closer to 7.5.
Monitor TDS; ensure it remains within the optimal range for both fish and plants.
Maintain water temperature around 28°C for optimal growth.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.046 / 7.021 / 7.08 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 310.025 / 295.1 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 28.015 / 26.0 / 30.06 °C (trend: flat)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
